text: Ani jevha amhi tumacyakaduna vacana ghetale ani tumacyavara tura parvata (adhantari) ubha kela (ani pharmavile) ki amhi je kahi pradana kele ahe te majabutine dhara ani aika. Tevha te mhanale, amhi aikale ani ajnabhanga kela ani tyancya manata vasarace prema (janu kahi) pajale (rujavale) gele. Tyancya kupra (inkara) mule. (Tyanna) sanga ki tumace imana tumhala va'ita adesa deta ahe. Jara tumhi imanadharaka asala
